amendment.description: To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for the Automated Communications Support System for WARFIGHTERS, Intelligence Community, Linguists, and Analysts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4828 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4828 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S8682; text: CR S8682) To make available from Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Army, up to $1,000,000 for the Automated Communications Support System for WARFIGHTERS, Intelligence Community, Linguists, and Analysts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4828 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4828 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Chambliss.
